description:
One bedroom modern apartment located several blocks away from the subway station and Central Park. The place has one queen size bed and a couch. Can accommodate 3 people (please no more than 3). It has everything you might need for a comfortable stay: wifi, digital TV, full kitchen, etc.

Subway and bus stations are several blocks away
name: One bedroom modern apartment
review: Clean quiet, and beautifully furnished, it's the perfect sanctuary for a few days in the big apple
